title: Obtain the Sinner
text: Hello, wandering souls. Come and pick up this "Call at 3 AM." Wandering around on a lightless night, are you trying to say something to me?

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: The midnight chime sounded. Come, stay with me...

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: I will turn everything you give me into a cage that binds you...!

title: Level Start
text: The phone is ringing, my dear. I'm right behind you...

title: Win Battles
text: Goodbye, my dear.

title: Lose Battles
text: The phone keeps ringing non-stop... Gimme a break...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Thank you for tuning in.

title: Die in Battles
text: No... No... Stop talking...

title: Greeting
text: What story will you share with me today?

title: Conversation 1
text: If you can't sleep, why not tune in to my broadcast, "Call at 3 AM". I hope it can bring some gentleness into your night.

title: Conversation 2
text: People always look for something they desire, something that soothe them in me. How sad... Ah, but, I'm looking forward to you being a guest on my show.

title: Conversation 3
text: I can take all the emotions others flood me with, and grind them with my mind and heart into a smiling voice on the airwaves.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Humans are such amazing creatures. After that electrifying moment of locking eyes, you and I no longer look the same for each other.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: If it weren't for all those rumors and legends, I could read poems or tell a story to the sound of the midnight rain... then greet the first ray of dawn after a rainy night...

title: Special Conversation 3
text: "Her silhouette slowly approaches you from behind, envelops you, and finally... embraces you...!" Oops, did I startle you? Don't be scared... it's just me.

title: Full Compliance
text: My views have been overturned, and my world has been changed, but I know... this is not misfortune. Thank you for becoming the fissure in this world to free me from my shackles...

title: Idle
text: A Little Poem, line 27: "If the world could be changed by dreaming, then I would sleep in this dream and never wake up, until the joyous world of my imagination has been created."

title: Annoyed
text: You want me to stay with you this much...? Don't worry... I'll call you tonight.

title: Special Attention
text: Don't be so nervous. I can stay on the line with you. You just continue with what you're doing, and I'll be here with you. If you still feel ill at ease... how about I sing a song for you?

title: Dispatch
text: Let me see, what's different about your world.

title: Dispatch Complete
text: This is all that I can give you.

title: Level Up
text: Come, come closer... a little bit more.

title: Join Team
text: The phone is ringing... My dear.

title: Head Pat
text: Do you want to know how much I've missed you?
